snippet: The children of James McNair will split the settlement, which was reached with Walmart in January, months after one of its trucks hit a van carrying Mr. McNair, Mr. Morgan and others on the New Jersey Turnpike.
abstract: Walmart reaches settlement to pay $10 million to family of James McNair, comedian who was killed in New Jersey Turnpike crash involving Walmart truck and limousine carrying McNair and television star Tracy Morgan.
lead_paragraph: The children of James McNair will split the settlement, which was reached with Walmart in January, months after one of its trucks hit a van carrying Mr. McNair, Mr. Morgan and others on the New Jersey Turnpike.

headline.main: Walmart Pays $10 Million to Family of Comedian Killed in Tracy Morgan Crash
headline.print_headline: Walmart to Pay $10 Million to Children of Crash Victim
